Levels.Feedback: a block in which one is provided a feedback on the performance
Levels.Punishment: a block in which bets are mostly unsuccesful
Levels.Reward: a block in which bets are mostly succesful

Levels.lower_than_five: guessed that it would be lower than five
Levels.higher_than_five: guessed that it would be higher than five

Levels.MostlyPunishment: a block in which bets are mostly unsuccesful
Levels.MostlyReward: a block in which bets are mostly succesful

nbloc.Description: Progressive number of the block performed

ntrial.Description: Progressive number of the trial performed within a given block

onset.Description: Onset of the stimulus in seconds

duration.Description: duration of the stimulus in seconds

response_time.Description: Time taken to provide the answer

stim_file_feedback.Description: Path and name of the image file presented as feedback

feedback_number.Description: Number of the feedback stimulus presented

countdown_stim.Description: If used, decreasing number shown on the screen during the get-ready phase of the task
